data.title: Pay a Toll Notice for the Sydney Harbour Bridge or Tunnel
data.meta_description: If you've received a Toll Notice for travel on the Sydney Harbour Bridge or Tunnel, you can pay for this online using your credit card or an electronic tagâ€¦
data.text:
Introduction

If you've received a Toll Notice for travel on the Sydney Harbour Bridge or Tunnel, you can pay for this online using your credit card or an electronic tag account.

If you've mislaid or lost the notice you are still able to pay online. You only need your vehicle's number plate and the state it's registered in to search for an unpaid toll trip.

What you need

your number plate, and the state the vehicle is registered in, or

your toll notice number if you have it.

How to pay

Select the 'Pay online' button.

Enter the vehicle's details or the toll notice number.

Select 'Continue'.

Enter your payment details.

Follow the prompts to complete your transaction.

More information

If you're making a payment using your E-Toll tag account and don't have sufficient funds, or if you provide incorrect details, you'll receive a further notice by mail.

If you're paying using your E-Toll tag account, your 'Toll Notice Administration' fee will be replaced with the 'Toll Notice Transfer' fee.

If you're not paying using an E-Toll tag account, a 'Toll Notice Administration' fee will be applied.

If you've received a toll notice from another operator other than Transport for NSW, please refer to the toll notice for payment options.

Payment methods

You can review transaction payment options on our payment methods page.
